page.title: 17A Uyeasound 5 year old.
page.content: Monday 13th May 1985. 8.00 Got up and had breakfast.Mum drove my brother and I to school. 9.30 School started.Had a service, built animals and read words to my teacher. 10.45 Playtime. 11.00 Talked with Speech Therapist. Work on number 4 with Remedial Teacher. 12.45 School dinner of stew,onions, potatoes followed by ice-cream.Milk to drink.Chewed a bubble gum.Played a magic game in the grass with the girls. 2.00 Watched T.V.,looked at books,drew and wrote about Ben. 3.00 Playtime. 3.15 Unst Policeman spoke about birds and birds' eggs. 3.45 Went home,played,had tea,read words,washed,had a story.8.00 Bed.
